methods.name: __construct
methods.description:
Create a SafeSearch annotation result

This class is instantiated internally and is used to represent the result of Cloud Vision's SafeSearch annotation feature. It should not be instantiated directly. For complete usage instructions, please refer to Google\Cloud\Vision\Annotation::safeSearch().

methods.name: isAdult
methods.description: Check whether the image contains adult content.

params.name: strength
params.description: Value should be one of "low", "medium" or "high". Recommended usage is via Face::STRENGTH_* constants. Higher strength will result in fewer true results, but fewer false positives. Defaults to "low".

methods.name: isSpoof
methods.description: Check whether the image was modified to make it appear funny or offensive.

params.name: strength
params.description: Value should be one of "low", "medium" or "high". Recommended usage is via Face::STRENGTH_* constants. Higher strength will result in fewer true results, but fewer false positives. Defaults to "low".

methods.name: isMedical
methods.description: Check whether the image contains medical content

params.name: strength
params.description: Value should be one of "low", "medium" or "high". Recommended usage is via Face::STRENGTH_* constants. Higher strength will result in fewer true results, but fewer false positives. Defaults to "low".

methods.name: isViolent
methods.description: Check whether the image contains violent content

params.name: strength
params.description: Value should be one of "low", "medium" or "high". Recommended usage is via Face::STRENGTH_* constants. Higher strength will result in fewer true results, but fewer false positives. Defaults to "low".

methods.name: adult
methods.description: Represents the adult contents likelihood for the image.

methods.name: spoof
methods.description: Spoof likelihood. The likelihood that an obvious modification was made to the image's canonical version to make it appear funny or offensive.
